item.title: How do I keep myself updated about data, product management, productivity and others stuffs
item.description: Twitter Yes, I have a Twitter profile, that I use basically to follow people that I like, see @RespectfulMemes, get impressed by @georainbolt and laugh with thing like this: People that I follow: @Sumanth_077 @FlerlageKev @InsightsMachine @barbalhofernandPT-BR @AgulloBernat @dair_ai @thejustinwelsh @xlth Email Newsletters: Product Hunt Daily Product School DEV Community Digest Medium Daily Digest Manual do Usu√°rio PT-BR SQLBI Newsletter
